mapper.select: SELECT no, title, engTitle, releaseDate, state, director, actors, summary, rating, poster, maniaNo, regdate FROM(SELECT no, title, engTitle, releaseDate, state, director, actors, summary, rating, poster, maniaNo, regdate, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, title, eng_title engTitle, release_date releaseDate, state, director, actors, summary, rating, poster, mania_no maniaNo, regdate FROM movies ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT mo.no, mo.title, mo.eng_title engTitle, mo.release_date releaseDate, mo.state, mo.director, mo.actors, mo.summary, mo.rating, mo.poster, mo.mania_no maniaNo, mo.regdate, ma.nickname maniaNickname, ma.profile maniaProfile FROM movies mo, manias ma WHERE mo.mania_no = ma.no AND mo.no = #{no}
mapper.insert:
SELECT movies_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO movies (no, title, eng_title, release_date, state, director, actors, summary, rating, poster, mania_no, regdate) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{engTitle}, #{releaseDate}, #{state}, #{director}, #{actors}, #{summary}, #{rating}, #{poster}, #{maniaNo}, systimestamp)
